SKILLS & COMPETENCES
NGO HUY TRIEU
Senior Full Stack Developer / Team Leader
Ngày sinh:
 06/05/1992
Giới tính:
 Nam
Điện thoại:
 037-4210-615
Email:  trieu.ngohuy@gmail.com
Địa chỉ:
 69, Tran Thai Tong, Hue City
Website:  ...
INTRODUCING
I am a Senior Full Stack website developer with over 5 years of experiences. My career goals are to devote
myself to my work, improve my working skills and spirit to contribute to the development of the company. 
Here are my careers orientations: 
1. Looking forward to long-term work, develop yourself to contribute more to the company.
2. Looking forward to working with a worthy salary. 
3. Looking forward to having the opportunity to advance and develop personal skills.
Codeigniter ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
Git & Gitlab
||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
9/2014 - 12/2014
Doanh nhân việt
Full Stack Developer
- Language: PHP, HTML/CSS, Jquery/Javascript.
- PHP framework: Codeigniter
- Database: Mysql, MongoDB.
- Details:
-   Exchanging with team members about the project, giving an opinion
about developing technical, workflow...
-   Responsibility in developing websites about e-commerce, news and
landing page.
-   Responsibility in developing backend and frontend using PHP with
frameworks Laravel, Codeigniter.
-   Responsibility in design customer websites projects using
HTML/CSS/Javascript.
-   Responsibility in fixing bugs and upgrade websites.
-   Responsibility in testing websites.
-   Responsibility in merge and review sources.
1/2015 - Current
Brycen Vietnam
Developer PHP, Java, .Net (Winform), ASP, Android
- Language: PHP, Java, C#, HTML/CSS, Javascript.
- PHP framework: Zend
- Database: Mysql, SQL Server.
- Details: 
-   Exchanging with team members about the project, giving an opinion
about developing technical, workflow...
-   Responsibility in analysis project requirements 
-   Responsibility in communicating with the customer about Q&A,
adjust requirements and receive feedback through the communicator. 
-   Responsibility in adjusting project schedule and workflow if there is
changing about the requirements. 
-   Responsibility in creating estimate and workflow documents 
-   Responsibility in managing and distribute tasks to members 
-   Tracking employee's working progress and promptly solve member's
problems.
-   Responsibility in developing websites using PHP with framework
CakePHP. Developing ASP .NET website.
-   Responsibility in developing Restaurant POS website: display news
about the restaurant, food and drinks. Customer can order food to the
restaurant on a website. Create RESTful API system for mobile app.
-   Responsibility in developing a mobile app for employees ordering
food and drinks for customers.
-   Responsibility in developing a mobile app for customers can easily
create a CV on mobile.
WORK EXPERIENCE
-   Responsibility in developing frontend using Javascript
-   Responsibility in developing an android mobile app.
-   Responsibility in developing a WinForms app.
-   Responsibility in design frontend websites using HTML/CSS, jquery.
-   Responsibility in design mobile app layout.
-   Responsibility in fixing bugs and upgrade sources. 
-   Responsibility in testing websites, mobile app project. 
-   Responsibility in merge and review sources.
-   Experiences using Git, SVN to storage and merge sources.
1/2015 - Current
Outsourcing freelancer
Developer / Team Leader
- Language: PHP, HTML/CSS, Javascript
- Javascript framework: Vuejs, Angularjs
- PHP framework: Laravel, Codeigniter, Wordpress...
- Database: Mysql
- OS: Windows, Linux
- Details: 
-   Responsibility in analysis project requirements 
-   Responsibility in communicating with the customer about Q&A,
adjust requirements, receive feedback and adjust project schedule and
workflow if there is changing about the requirements.
-   Responsibility in creating estimate and workflow documents 
-   Responsibility in managing and distribute tasks to members 
-   Tracking employee's working progress and promptly solve member's
problems.
-   Responsibility in developing websites using PHP with frameworks
Laravel, Codeigniter, Wordpress...
-   Responsibility in developing websites about: Ecommerce, News,
POS, REST API system... 
-   Responsibility in developing frontend using Javascript (Vuejs,
Angularjs)
-   Responsibility in design frontend websites using
HTML/CSS/Javascript.
-   Responsibility in fixing bugs and upgrade sources. 
-   Responsibility in testing websites project. 
-   Responsibility in merge and review sources and release projects.
-   Experiences developing on Linux Manjaro, Ubuntu.
-   Experiences using Git, Gitlab to storage and merge sources,
manager tasks.
-   Experiences using Docker for setting developing environment
10/2010 - 7/2014
PHU XUAN UNIVERSITY
Major: Information technology
Good / 8.19
EDUCATION
CERTIFICATE
2013
English Level B certificate
2013
English contest
2014
TOEIC certificate
English
Advanced. Fluent communication, reading, writing
LANGUAGE
INTERESTS
Reading | Travel | Video game | Cartoon
